glm::conjugate
GLM_FUNC_DECL GLM_CONSTEXPR qua< T, Q > conjugate(qua< T, Q > const &q)
Returns the q conjugate.

Returns the q inverse.

Linear interpolation of two quaternions.

Spherical linear interpolation of two quaternions.
